column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I decided to bake a cake for my brother 's birthday .
#id=2
#text=He likes chocolate cake the best so I chose a box of double fudge cake for him .
#id=3
#text=It was a cake mix in a box because that 's the easiest way to back a cake .
#id=4
#text=The back of the box said to preheat the oven so I did and then I took out a bowl , a mixer , milk , eggs and oil .
#id=5
#text=I opened the cake box and poured the cake mix into the bowl .
#id=6
#text=Then I added two eggs and the amount of milk and oil the back of the box said to use .
#id=7
#text=Next I used the mixer to stir it all together .
#id=8
#text=After that I used a little more oil to grease a cake pan .
#id=9
#text=The back of the box also told me which size cake pan to use .
#text=Once the cake pan was ready , I poured the mixed cake batter into it and smoothed it into the edges then opened the oven to put it inside .
#text=I used an oven mitt on my hand for that part because the oven was hot .
#text=Once the door was closed again , I set a timer to the right amount of time , according to the back of the box , and then waited .
#text=By the time the timer went off , the cake smelled really good and I turned off the oven , then opened it and took the cake out with oven mitts again .
#text=Then I let it cool on a rack on the counter .
#text=When it was cool I opened a container of fudge frosting and spread it all over the cake .
#text=I just need to put candles on it and I think my brother will really like it .
